metadata.synopsis:
Age: mid-30-40s.
Female
Bio: Rough and working-class. A veteran of many expeditions, Remira is nonetheless shaken after a raid gone horribly wrong and trying to hide it behind bravado. She feels guilty for leaving a new recruit to die, but tries to wave it away and gets defensive if confronted over it. She’s sarcastic and casually racist.

0.speaker: Remira
0.text: Said it from the start. Shouldn't have trusted those foulbloods.
0.context: NodeContext: Very nasty. All-but-saying a slur re: tieflings

1.speaker: Remira
1.text: I'm not bloody dying here. I won't.
1.context: NodeContext: She's waiting for Zevlor to open the gates since goblisn are coming.
